tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE financial_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  category VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Financial_Data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Budgeting (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  budget_amount DECIMAL,
  actual_amount DECIMAL,
  variance DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE forecast_data (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   year INT,
   quarter INT,
   revenue DECIMAL(15, 2),
   expenses DECIMAL(15, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE financial_activities (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   activity_date DATE,
   action VARCHAR(255),
   amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
   category VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE budget_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category VARCHAR,
  amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE forecast_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  scenario VARCHAR,
  revenue DECIMAL,
  expenses DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE financial_reports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  report_type VARCHAR,
  total_revenue DECIMAL,
  total_expenses DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR,
  email VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE permissions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  role VARCHAR
)
